BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 Inside the code or in the description we refer to the pwnagotchi/default.yml or pwnagotchi/defaults.yml.
 Example in:  pwnagotchi/builder/pwnagotchi.yml I find:
 <denchmark-code>All the configuration options can be found on /etc/pwnagotchi/default**s**.yml
 </denchmark-code>
 
 or
 <denchmark-code>Add your configuration overrides on this file any configuration changes done to default**s**.yml will be lost!
 </denchmark-code>
 
 but actually the file is in:  /etc/pwnagotchi/default.yml
 I din't modify the pwnagotchi/builder/pwnagotchi.yml file myself because I saw that there are references to defaults.yml also in: pwnagotchi/utils.py or setup.py and I didn't want to create any other errors.
 I prefer that you look at us, you know the project better than me.
 Environment (please complete the following information):
 
 v1.0.0RC4
